newsitem.title: USA: IMNET Systems Inc Q3 March 31 net increases.
newsitem.headline: IMNET Systems Inc Q3 March 31 net increases.

text.p: Three Months Ended Nine Months Ended

NOTE: On September 30, 1996, the Company issued 429,292 shares of its common stock for all of the outstanding common stock of Hunter International Inc which merged with IMNET in a pooling of interests and, as a result, the Company's consolidated financial statements for all periods prior to the merger have been restated to include the financial position and results of operations of Hunter International Inc.

Net income for the third quarter and first nine months of 1997 excludes non-recurring charges of $1.8 million ($0.18 per share) and $2.6 million ($0.26 per share), respectively, related to a writedown of assets associated with its MedVision product line, due to the recent Value Added Reseller Agreement entered into with ISG Technologies Inc and the relocation costs associated with the company's move to its new corporate headquarters.
Net income for the third quarter and first nine months of 1996 excludes non-recurring charges of $4.6 million ($0.53 per share) and $10.4 million ($1.28 per share), respectively.
The company said its earnings per share are reported using a pro forma tax rate of 38 percent.
